blocks.name: elin
blocks.content: Expansion of membership in an intersection of two classes. Theorem 12 of [Suppes] p. 25. (Contributed by NM, 29-Apr-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm elin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cin(c1, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c2)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, cin(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  df-in(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c2)
  elab2g(hs0, c0, universe, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, c0 ‚àà c1, c0 ‚àà c2)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c1)
  eleq1(hs0, c0, c2)
  df-in(hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß c0 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: nfin
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for the intersection of classes. (Contributed by NM, 15-Sep-2003.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cin(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cin(c0, c1), crab(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  dfin5(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfrab(s0, hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfin(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ F/(s0,(c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1), { hs0 ‚àà c0 | hs0 ‚àà c1 })
  dfin5(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfrab(s0, hs0, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rabbi2dva
blocks.content: Deduction from a wff to a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 14-Jan-2014.)

blocks.name: inidm
blocks.content: Idempotent law for intersection of classes. Theorem 15 of [Suppes] p. 26. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: inass
blocks.content: Associative law for intersection of classes. Exercise 9 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 3-May-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm inass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cin(cin(c0, c1), c2), cin(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
} = {
  ineqri(hs0, cin(c0, c1), c2, cin(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
  3bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, cin(c1, c2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))))
  bitr4i(wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  anass(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  elin(cv(hs0), c0, cin(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm inass(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÇ c2)=(c0 ‚ãÇ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
} = {
  ineqri(hs0, (c0 ‚ãÇ c1), c2, (c0 ‚ãÇ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  3bitr4i((hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)))
  bitr4i(((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  anass(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  anbi2i(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  elin(hs0, c1, c2)
  anbi1i(hs0 ‚àà(c0 ‚ãÇ c1), hs0 ‚àà c2, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c1))
  elin(hs0, c0, c1)
  elin(hs0, c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ‚ãÇ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)))
}

blocks.name: inss1
blocks.content: The intersection of two classes is a subset of one of them. Part of Exercise 12 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-1994.)

blocks.name: inss2
blocks.content: The intersection of two classes is a subset of one of them. Part of Exercise 12 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 27-Apr-1994.)

blocks.name: ssin
blocks.content: Subclass of intersection. Theorem 2.8(vii) of [Monk1] p. 26. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jun-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2)), wss(c0, cin(c1, c2)), wa(wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)))))
  3bitrri(wa(wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))), wal(hs0, wa(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  imbi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cin(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elin(cv(hs0), c1, c2)
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  jcab(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  19.26(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  anbi12i(wss(c0, c1), wss(c0, c2), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c2)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, cin(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cin(c1, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2)‚Üî c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
} = {
  3bitr4i((c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚àß c0 ‚äÜ c2), c0 ‚äÜ(c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2))), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))))
  3bitrri((‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1))‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2))), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2))), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))), ‚àÄ(hs0,((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2))))
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2)), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  imbi2i(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà(c1 ‚ãÇ c2), (hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2))
  elin(hs0, c1, c2)
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà c2)), ((hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)‚àß(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  jcab(hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  19.26(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1), (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2))
  anbi12i(c0 ‚äÜ c1, c0 ‚äÜ c2, ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c1)), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà c2)))
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c1)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, c2)
  dfss2(hs0, c0, (c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 ‚ãÇ c2))
}

blocks.name: ssini
blocks.content: An inference showing that a subclass of two classes is a subclass of their intersection. (Contributed by NM, 24-Nov-2003.)

blocks.name: ssind
blocks.content: A deduction showing that a subclass of two classes is a subclass of their intersection. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: ssrin
blocks.content: Add right intersection to subclass relation. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: sslin
blocks.content: Add left intersection to subclass relation. (Contributed by NM, 19-Oct-1999.)

blocks.name: ssrind
blocks.content: Add right intersection to subclass relation. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: ss2in
blocks.content: Intersection of subclasses. (Contributed by NM, 5-May-2000.)

blocks.name: ssinss1
blocks.content: Intersection preserves subclass relationship. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-1999.)

blocks.name: inss
blocks.content: Inclusion of an intersection of two classes. (Contributed by NM, 30-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: rexin
blocks.content: Restricted existential quantification over intersection. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 17-Dec-2018.)

blocks.name: dfss7
blocks.content: Alternate definition of subclass relationship. (Contributed by AV, 1-Aug-2022.)
